title: The PBE server
body: I don't understand how i can signup for the PBE server, please help me

replies.body: As long as you are Honor 3 or higher, you should be able to [signup here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe).  Are you having any specific issue?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Mai22JeI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-13T23:10:14.156+0000)
>
> As long as you are Honor 3 or higher, you should be able to [signup here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe).  Are you having any specific issue?

thanks, i think i finally got it, ill say if it dosent work
